title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
17:19 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
17:21 <abusenius> has quit  
17:46 <Intertesto> What is the correct syntax of preference option, ADDITIONAL JAVAMAIL PROPERTIES? I would like to setup mail.smtp.localhost='intertesto.com' but it doesn't work  
17:46 <wikiNewbie> has quit  
17:48 <@sdumitriu> Intertesto: key=value pairs, each one on its on line  
17:48 <@sdumitriu> You don't need to put quotes around values  
17:49 <mflorea> has quit  
17:59 <Intertesto> @sdumitriu, thank you, but my postfix still say "postfix/smtpd[9253]: warning: Illegal address syntax from localhost.localdomain[127.0.0.1] in MAIL command: <[[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)> " and xwiki log "[http://xwiki.intertesto.com/xwiki/bin/get/Main/?xpage=shareinline] ERROR c.x.x.p.m.MailSenderPlugin     - sendEmailFromTemplate: XWiki.SharePage vcontext: org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext@5fe425  com.sun.mail.smtp.SMTPSendFailedException:  
18:00 <@sdumitriu> Can you pastebin the whole exception?  
18:03 <Intertesto> http://pastebin.com/7Zg35Y14  
18:09 <jvdrean1> has joined #xwiki  
18:13 <jvdrean> has quit  
18:32 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:47 <Intertesto> has quit  
18:47 <evalica> has quit  
18:49 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
18:54 <Enygma`> has quit  
18:59 <evalica> has quit  
19:10 <arkub> has quit  
19:44 <cjdelisle> has joined #xwiki  
19:53 <sburjan> has quit  
19:54 <+jvelociter> abusenius: Hello  
19:54 <+abusenius> hi  
19:54 <+jvelociter> I've just created XWIKI-6784  
19:54 <+jvelociter> it seems when the token is wrong, the ajax save does not report the failure to save properly  
19:55 <+abusenius> hm  
19:55 <@sdumitriu> There are lots of cases where S&C doesn't report errors  
19:55 <+abusenius> I'll take a look at that  
19:56 <+jvelociter> great  
19:57 <+jvelociter> BTW there is another scenario when one can have a invalid token and which is not mentionned  
19:57 <+jvelociter> server restart :)  
19:57 <+jvelociter> (not sure if we ought to mention it though)  
19:57 <+jvelociter> (since users cannot always know whether or not the server has restarted)  
19:58 <+abusenius> feel free to give some ideas for improving he user message  
19:58 <+abusenius> I think we should maybe write it less technically  
19:59 <+abusenius> without mentioning the token or something  
20:00 <+abusenius> btw. can we set up jenkins to violently kill any test if it runs for more than 4 hours or something?  
20:00 <+abusenius> the functional tests seem to hang every few runs
